item.title: Metro-Engine
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:18, topic:535160”][quote author=pkerjosh13 link=topic=653964.msg4380826#msg4380826 date=1383500761]
Currently i have Unlimitted space and bandwidth for 5 years with godaddy professional hosting, i confirmed with them that i am aloud using my crawlers as often as i want, and currently as of today i have 7 people crawling and creating a database structure we also are working on the database for a Smart AI Bot that gives you the best possible result and has basic functions, i realize this is a big project but i am determined .
[/quote]That space suddenly stops being unlimited when you’re storing anything over a few GB.[/quote]

Then there’s the “unlimited” bandwidth that seems to become limited once they complain about CPU usage.

Read full topic

not sure how efficient your 7 crawlers is, but it’s not much.

http://www.whois.ws/whois_index/index.s.php
http://www.registered-domains-list.com

a lot of websites out there, but surely you can start a few more crawlers to parse those urls.

item.title: Metro-Engine
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“pkerjosh13, post:3, topic:535160”]I was thinking the same thing, however metro is a theme and it has been used many times, so im not 100% sure yet[/quote]windows dropped the coined term “metro” due to copyright disputes between some German company.

also, you’re trying to compete with two professional companies that have been collecting data for years.

do you have any storage for data? do you have your own crawlers? how do you plan on making a search engine with data you haven’t collected? just mirror it over to google or bing themself?

Read full topic
